programme.title: The Burning Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E12, A detective keeps a murder investigation going for 16 years and finally proves a woman killed her husband in a satanic rite; THE BURNING SECRET: and a rape victim fails to get a conviction on her attacker.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Mistaken for a Killer/The Boy and the Monster
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E27, Advances in DNA technology that take place over 20 years help police to finally identify the man who brutally stabbed two women to death.

programme.title: Circle of Friends
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E07, When 18-year-old Shannon Siders' body is found in the woods, everyone in the small town of Newaygo, Michigan, becomes a suspect--but no one is convicted of the crime.

programme.title: Killer in the Storm
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E01, In the heart of Cajun country, young mother Brenda DuPont is found murdered in her home in May 1988. The initial investigation sputters and turns cold, but her sister Linda vows to solve her murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E16, A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E25, A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E03, When a church deacon is found shot to death it looks like police may have stumbled upon a multi-party murder plot. And, a wife remains a key suspect in her husband's murder case for six years, until she attempts to prove her own innocence.

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S06E06, Bill Kurtis examines one of the most infamous cold cases in Los Angeles history.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E19, After U.S. Navy sailor disappears in 68, the Navy claims he went AWOL. But his sister works for over 30 years to prove that he was really killed. And DNA from a cigarette butt helps detectives to unravel a 20-year-old case of rape and murder.

programme.title: Killer On The Strip/The Doll Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E11, In 1989, socialite Susan Doll was found beaten, raped, and strangled in Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E13, A 14-year-old boy is charged with the murder of his sister, but his public defender believes the real killer is still on the loose. And two deteriorated slides, made 16 years earlier, give police the evidence they need to reopen the cold case.

programme.title: The Sword And The Dragon
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Sword And The Dragon, S06E17, A Russian hero plots an invasion against the Mongols in The Sword and the Dragon. Mike and the Bots create their own topical comedy show, reenact the table cloth scene from the movie, and try their hand at playing Dungeons and Dragons.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Days Of Our Years
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E23, Stay safe with this informative short about occupational hazards.

programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. Trouble is brewing after Cassie's mystery guest Ashley goes missing.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's mischievous cousin Abigail is back in Middleton.

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. Abby returns to Maryland when she receives a phone call from her sister.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part One
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunites in Chesapeake Shores for the first time in years.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part Two
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunion weekend continues.

Redwood Curtain, 19950423000000 +0000, A story of an Amer-Asian girl, with the reluctant approval of her adoptive parents, seeks her natural father in the redwood forests of Northern California. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

Remember Sunday, 20130421000000 +0000, A down-on-her-luck waitress meets jewelry store clerk, Gus, but complications ensue because of his memory problems. A brain aneurysm three years earlier gives Gus a blank slate the second his alarm wakes him each day.

The Blackwater Lightship, 20040204000000 +0000, Based on the novel by Colm Toibin, The Blackwater Lightship tells the compelling story of reconciliation between three generations of women that has been marked by decades of misunderstandings.
Nearlyweds, 20130112000000 +0000, Complications arise when three women (Danielle Panabaker, Jessica Parker Kennedy) learn that their marriages are not official.
Come Dance at My Wedding, 20090606000000 +0000, A woman (Brooke Nevin) faces opposition from her estranged father (John Schneider) when she plans to sell the family's dance studio.

Cedar Cove, 20130720000000 +0000, When Olivia Lockhart (Andie MacDowell) is given the opportunity for a federal judgeship, she must face the challenging decision, and while tempting, she risks losing her new romance and leaving the town and people she loves most.

programme.title: Bounty
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E15, After Netan (Eric Steinberg), and the Lucian Alliance, are undermined by SG-1 yet again, he decides to put a bounty out on their heads. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Bad Guys
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E16, Mistaken for rebels on an alien planet, SG-1 must play the part of hostage takers in hopes to buy themselves enough time to be rescued before they're executed. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Talion
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E17, Barely surviving the bombing massacre of a peaceful Jaffa summit, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) must go rogue to track down and stop a Jaffa leader named Arkad (Craig Fairbrass) who plans to take control of the Jaffa nation and deliver them to the Ori.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E18, Vala's (Claudia Black) father Jacek (guest star Fred Willard) contacts Stargate Command wishing to trade information about a series of planned attacks on Earth in exchange for sanctuary on the planet. Also starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Dominion
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E19, In an elaborate plan using Vala Mal Doran (Claudia Black) as bait to capture Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin), SG-1 themselves are surprised when Ba'al (guest star Cliff Simon) intercepts Adria from under them to use in his own evil plan.

programme.title: Unending
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E20, With extinction imminent, the Asgard hand over all their knowledge and technology to SG-1, but not before the Ori launch an attack trying to intercede. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Children Of The Gods (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E01, As Colonel Jack O'Neill and his team journey to Abydos to confront deadly warriors and laser-firing Death Gliders, O'Neill realizes that this new mission seems hauntingly familiar and that an old enemy has returned to take his revenge on Earth.

programme.title: The Enemy Within
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E03, In this suspenseful tale of survival of the fittest, O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and the SG-1 team must attempt to remove a Goa'uld larva that has infected Kawalsky's (guest star Jay Acovone) brain … but time is running out!

programme.title: Condemned
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E05, The team discover a planet that has cruel punishments for anyone who commits a crime; they are placed near the Stargate to be taken by the Wraith. This proves to be too effective forcing the society to put innocent folk in jail to please the Wraith.

programme.title: Trinity
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E06, The team discover the remains of an experiment the Ancients were working on to create the ultimate power generator and McKay believes he can finish what the Ancients started. Teyla and Ronon discover Ronon is not the last of his kind.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E07, Beckett begins experimenting with a new treatment that could turn the Wraiths into humans. The team finds a young Wraith girl, who could be Beckett's first patient. Having been raised by a human, the girl is eager, and reckless, to try anything.

programme.title: Conversion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E08, After being injected with Beckett's Wraith treatment, Sheppard's life is in danger as he slowly is transforming into an Iratus bug hybrid. The team rushes to find a cure and reverse the side effects, but in the end it might be up to Sheppard.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E09, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team discover an Ancient warship called Aurora that is existing in suspended animation. Sheppard boards their ship via a virtual environment, in the hopes of learning valuable information from the Ancients.

programme.title: The Lost Boys
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E10, The team are kidnapped by none other than Lt. Aiden Ford who has put together his own team of super soldiers, men who have taken the Wraith enzyme. Ford's team intends to destroy a Hive Ship to prove how amazing and powerful the enzyme is.

programme.title: The Hive
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E11, The team is taken hostage by the Wraith after an attempt to destroy the Hive fails. Sheppard soon finds himself in front of the Wraith Queen, who wants answers. McKay returns to Atlantis in the hopes to convince the guards to help rescue the team.

programme.title: Epiphany
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E12, The team discovers a device created by the Ancients that, without warning, pulls Sheppard in. As the team scrambles to release him from the strange place he is stuck in, McKay discovers that time moves differently inside.

programme.title: Sandcastles
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E07, Baywatch lifeguards gain insight into the plight of the homeless when Hobie befriends a girl who's living on the streets. Eddie is attacked by a former mental patient known as “Hector the Collector.”

programme.title: Thin or Die
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E08, Eddie goes on a blind date with Nicole, who turns out to be morbidly overweight, which leads to complications and an unlikely friendship. But Nicole's diet pills prove life-threatening. Meanwhile, Mitch’s life is comically disrupted by a stray dog.

programme.title: The Trophy, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E09, Eddie is arrested for statutory rape after a teenage girl lies about seducing him in his tower. Meanwhile, Eric Turner, bitter about the paralyzing accident he suffered as a lifeguard, returns to Baywatch to reconcile his relationship with Megan.

programme.title: The Trophy, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E10, Eddie is suspended from Baywatch over the statutory rape charge. He feels abandoned when no one believes his innocence pleas. Meanwhile, the reckless, paraplegic Turner, wanting to win Megan back, tries to impress her by hang-gliding off a cliff.

programme.title: If Looks Could Kill
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E11, Mitch falls for the beautiful woman he saved from drowning after she drove her car off a cliff, unaware that she's a cold-blooded murderer and con artist who was attempting to dispose of the murder victim of her latest scam when Mitch rescued her.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E12, Mitch and his ex-wife Gayle reconnect at their twenty-year high school reunion with unforeseen results. Eddie discovers an abandoned baby under his tower with a note imploring him to take care of it for 24 hours.

programme.title: War of Nerves
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E13, Drug lord Mason Sato is released from prison and determined to seek revenge Mitch Buchannon, who helped send him away. When Sato kidnaps Hobie and Kaye, Mitch and Sato end up in a samurai-style fight to the death.

programme.title: Big Monday
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E14, Reports of a coming storm and enormous waves bring painful memories for Mitch. Meanwhile, Kaye tries to persuade the parents of a deaf girl to send her to sign-language school.

programme.title: Sea of Flames
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E15, A drugged-out drifter torches Eddie's lifeguard tower which leads the team to discover an illegal, lab distributing a new drug. Mitch and Thorpe try to convince the city board to buy wave runners in order to optimize their ability to save lives.

programme.title: Now Sit Right Back and You'll Hear a Tale
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E16, Eddie slips on the sand and hits his head on the tower ramp. When he regains consciousness, Eddie finds himself on an island with Gilligan, Mary Ann and the rest of the castaways.

programme.title: The Chamber
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E17, Mitch has an out-of-body experience when his attempt to save a trapped diver without scuba gear leaves him with the bends, dangerously close to death and in desperate need of a decompression chamber.

programme.title: Shark's Cove
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E18, Shauni is suspicious when a swimmer training for the Olympics disappears in "Shark's Cove.” Eddie's world is turned upside-down when he is reunited with his schizophrenic half-brother.

programme.title: The Lost Treasure of Tower 12
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E19, A bohemian poet flirts with Shauni, and with danger when he uses his metal detector to find the buried stash of two jewel thieves.

programme.title: The Big Spill
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E20, Mitch helps a former lifeguard, Lane Brody, investigate a corporation suspected of dumping deadly chemicals in the bay.

programme.title: Game of Chance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E21, Harvey and Mitch go to play poker on an offshore yacht where they are robbed by a masked man that drives an amphibious Jeep. Shauni invites Eddie over for dinner at her parents’ house where her snobbish father strongly disapproves of him.

programme.title: Summer of '85
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E22, Shauni and Eddie visit a local fortune teller who predicts that Eddie will soon meet his first true love. Shauni thought he already had, and that it was her! But it's Lorna, an older woman Eddie had a "Summer of '42" affair with as a teenager.

programme.title: River of No Return, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E01, The mysterious death of Mitch's uncle and the cryptic will he left, finds Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, and Shauni on a whitewater rafting adventure. Meanwhile, rookie lifeguard hopefuls participate in the annual qualifying swim.
